roleset.name: strike

role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: violence
example.text: Mary beat John with a wet noodle.

roleset.note: Comparison with 'hit' and 'win'. beat 0.2 and beat 0.3. Based on financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes hit-18.1-1.

roleset.name: (Cause) pulsating motion that often makes sound

example.name: all args, passivized
example.text: Another proposed reform is to have program traders answer to an ``uptick rule'' a reform instituted after the Great Crash of 1929 that protects against [stocks]-2 being relentlessly beaten *trace*-2 downward by those seeking to profit from lower prices, namely short sellers.
example.arg: by those seeking to profit from lower prices, namely short sellers

example.name: Heart beat
example.text: Her beart was beating against her chest.

roleset.note: I have the feeling this will always occur as "beat down(ward)".

example.name: no stated competition
example.text: Now, after *trace* beating them, Mr. Achenbaum is joining them.

example.name: stated competition
example.text: The product isn't widely used yet, but Toshiba, which [*T-1*] has already beaten everyone else in producing the current-generation one-megabit DRAMs...
example.arg: in producing the current-generation one-megabit DRAMs

example.name: success!
example.text: More recently, Guber Peters beat out a dozen other producers, reportedly including Robert Redford and Ted Turner, for rights to the life story of Chico Mendes, the murdered Brazilian union leader who fought developers in the Amazon rain forest.
example.arg: a dozen other producers, reportedly including Robert Redford and Ted Turner,
for rights to the life story of Chico Mendes, the murdered Brazilian union leader who fought developers in the Amazon rain forest

roleset.name: strike repeatedly

role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: more violence
example.text: Mary beats up John every day after school.

roleset.note: Poor John. No corresponding VN class with verb particle construction.
